> [hurensohn](#comment_1_145y9GYC9cAgPF2nC27KsHmJxzvWJvKCaj): Taxation is theft

Name me one functional society that never had any form of taxation.

100% of the world's richest corporations are based in countries where taxation is the norm, and in fact, if it weren't for the fact that they benefited from government subsidies funded by tax-payer money, many of them would be scraping the barrels.

It would, in fact, be theft if they AVOIDED taxation, because then they're not contributing to the very thing that allowed them to get rich in the first place.
